name: Chocolate Croissant
description: Buttery, flaky, and filled with chocolate. What's not to love?

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Warm, gooey, and guaranteed to make the coffee shop smell amazing.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: The perfect balance of sweet and tart. And yes, it counts as breakfast.

name: Apple Turnover
description: Like apple pie, but socially acceptable to eat with your hands.

name: Raspberry Danish
description: Cream cheese and raspberries in perfect harmony.
